creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: diving tortoise with splayed front claws and beady eyes; black flame-like forms at its rear end extend upwards to top center
inscription: Inscription: 不遍高明悪;　早秋曵尾長
markings: ULC, oval relief stamp: 水云梅; ULC, square intaglio stamp: 淡海竺常; ULC, square relief stamp:大真氏; LRC, square relief stamp with intaglio center:猶寤斎図書; LRC, square intaglio:　豊印環冲
title: Tortoise
